channel.title: Just had another revelation while being stoned
channel.description:
Alright guys, get ready for this one.. I smoked a little rock of weed just now and had the most craziest revelation you would ever hear.. I realized Adam Sandler looks a lot like Jerry Seinfeld, those two fuckers must be related but cause they're jews they decided not to tell anybody that their related so they can make more money. I bet if they made those fuckers do a dna test they would be 99%. Either that or the way they look like is a type of species of people. It may also be Jerry Seinfeld from the future, you see as hes a jew he discovered a time machine and came back to the past as Adam Sandler but doesn't tell anyone..
[img]http://imageshack.us/m/9/20/revelation2.png[/img]

item.title: Just had another revelation while being stoned
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

pkedpker:

You know why you guys don’t see it, because you never been as high as me, you are pussy smokers, afraid to smoke more weed when you start getting a little buzzy feeling you think ohhh I gotta stop before my heart stops, rofl what pussies… I hold in each bong hit for 1 minute and 30 seconds before I let it out.

Yeah when I smoke I normally have a stop watch so me and my buddies can time each others bong hits too.

oh wait…

oh and if i smoke a little more I wouldn’t be surprised if i make a connection between you and killer 99 pkz, rofl
